content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: netherite_block
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 18}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 23, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a netherite_block, I need to place 9 netherite_ingots in the crafting table in a square formation. The first step is to move one netherite_ingot from slot 18 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: netherite_block
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 23, "index": 42}]
thought: Next, I need to move another netherite_ingot to slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: netherite_block
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 7, "index": 18}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 64, "index": 20}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 23, "index": 42}]
thought: I continue moving netherite_ingots to adjacent slots until all 9 are placed in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 3 with quantity 1
